description: Quicken saves the QUICKEN2016 file in a proprietary format, which means the file should not be modified or moved. To export data, you can select File → Export and export your account information as a .QXF file.
The QUICKEN2016 file is saved in the following location by default:
You can save a backup of the data in a QUICKEN2016 file as a .QUICKEN2016BACKUP file. This is helpful for securing data in case the QUICKEN2016 file becomes corrupt or is lost.
